alert.note: Alert for Brown; Edmunds (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 4:09AM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Edmunds and southern Brown Counties through 600 AM CDT... At 508 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warner, or 10 miles southwest of Aberdeen, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Warner around 515 AM CDT. Aberdeen around 520 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bath, Stratford, Ferney and Groton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
